directions: In a bowl, mix the cream cheese, ranch dressing mix, artichoke hearts, roasted red peppers, and parsley. Chill 4 hours in the refrigerator before serving.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1/2 cup roasted red peppers, drained and chopped
title: Holiday Artichoke Dip
